definition: a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
kjvTranslation: ([phrase] be) able, [idiom] about, [phrase] armholes, at, axletree, because of, beside, border, [idiom] bounty, [phrase] broad, (broken-) handed, [idiom] by, charge, coast, [phrase] consecrate, [phrase] creditor, custody, debt, dominion, [idiom] enough, [phrase] fellowship, force, [idiom] from, hand(-staves, -y work), [idiom] he, himself, [idiom] in, labour, [phrase] large, ledge, (left-) handed, means, [idiom] mine, ministry, near, [idiom] of, [idiom] order, ordinance, [idiom] our, parts, pain, power, [idiom] presumptuously, service, side, sore, state, stay, draw with strength, stroke, [phrase] swear, terror, [idiom] thee, [idiom] by them, [idiom] themselves, [idiom] thine own, [idiom] thou, through, [idiom] throwing, [phrase] thumb, times, [idiom] to, [idiom] under, [idiom] us, [idiom] wait on, (way-) side, where, [phrase] wide, [idiom] with (him, me, you), work, [phrase] yield, [idiom] yourselves.

translations.bg: ръка (отворената), която показва власт, средства, посока и т.н.),
translations.cs: ruka (otevřená ruka (označující moc, prostředky, směr atd.),
translations.da: en hånd (den åbne, der indikerer magt, midler, retning osv.),
translations.de: eine Hand (die offene, die Macht, Mittel, Richtung usw. anzeigt),
translations.el: ένα χέρι (το ανοιχτό (που υποδηλώνει δύναμη, μέσα, κατεύθυνση κ.λπ.),

translations.et: käsi (avatud käsi (mis näitab võimu, vahendeid, suunda jne),
translations.fi: käsi (avattu käsi, joka osoittaa voimaa, keinoja, suuntaa jne.),
translations.fr: une main (celle qui est ouverte (indiquant le pouvoir, les moyens, la direction, etc.),
translations.hu: egy kéz (a nyitott kéz (hatalmat, eszközt, irányt stb. jelez),
translations.id: tangan (yang terbuka (menunjukkan kekuatan, sarana, arah, dll.),
translations.it: una mano (quella aperta, che indica potere, mezzi, direzione, ecc.),
translations.ja: 手（権力、手段、方向性などを示す）、

translations.nb: en hånd (den åpne (som indikerer makt, midler, retning osv.),

translations.pt: uma mão (a mão aberta (indicando poder, meios, direção, etc.),
